chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 12 mini has a problem: Intracommunity invoices do not include VAT. Thank you,

Hello, ecomobile:

I hope you are feeling well.

The customer contacted us indicating that you have issued the invoice with VAT. The invoice should be without VAT. Please correct the invoice.

We look forward to hearing from you.
Have a nice day.

Sincerely
Diego, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the invoice in this message. Do let me know if the customer still requires any further assistance. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
